subdisciplines.name: Quantum Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The application of quantum mechanics to chemical systems and processes.

subdisciplines.name: Quantum Computing
subdisciplines.description: The study of how quantum systems can be used to perform computing operations more efficiently than classical systems.

subdisciplines.name: Quantum Field Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of the quantization of classical fields, such as the electromagnetic field, in the framework of quantum mechanics.

subdisciplines.name: Quantum Gravity
subdisciplines.description: The study of the application of quantum mechanics to the field of gravitation.

subdisciplines.name: Quantum Information
subdisciplines.description: The study of how information can be processed and transmitted using quantum systems.
